name: Wabash National Corporation
description: Wabash National Corporation is a leading manufacturer of semi-trailers, truck bodies, and related products in the North American transportation industry. Founded in 1985 and headquartered in Lafayette, Indiana, Wabash National has earned a reputation for innovation and quality, specializing in the production of lightweight and durable trailers that enhance the efficiency of freight transportation. The company focuses on advanced composite materials, which reduce weight and improve fuel efficiency while maintaining structural integrity. Wabash manufactures a wide range of products including dry freight vans, refrigerated trailers, and platform trailers, catering to various segments of the transportation market. In addition to its core products, Wabash also provides aftermarket services and parts, ensuring long-term customer satisfaction and support. With a commitment to sustainability, Wabash is actively working on initiatives to reduce emissions and promote energy efficiency within the logistics and transportation sectors. The company aims to lead the industry in innovation, continuously striving to enhance the performance and reliability of its products while contributing to a greener future.
